CustomField.description: When selected, specialty pharmacy round robin assignment will require payers to have a list of pharmacies and there must be some intersection between the program pharmacy list and the payer pharmacy list in order to assign a pharmacy.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When selected, specialty pharmacy round robin assignment will require payers to have a list of pharmacies and there must be some intersection between the program pharmacy list and the payer pharmacy list in order to assign a pharmacy.
CustomField.label: Filter Round Robin by Payers
